/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a tranquil scene of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the surroundings. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze, casting dappled shadows on the pavement. On the right side of the street, there's a building with a red roof, its vibrant color contrasting beautifully with the surrounding greenery. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, adding to the serene ambiance of the scene. The image is captured in 360-degree panoramic format, providing a comprehensive view of the street and its surroundings.
